message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable considering the inflation.
Your turn Alice, but keep in mind the money is losing value quickly for you!
The clock is ticking, Bob.  I'll take a little less to settle this now.
This is my last offer Alice. Take it or leave it, but the money won't be worth much soon.
Okay Bob, let's be realistic. We're both losing out here. 50/50 is the only fair solution at this point.
